title: Strengthening Business Practice Competency: Site-Centered Construction Safety Practical Workshop: Constructivist-Based Safety Training

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of standard construction site work procedures
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify the five major risk factors in construction sites and explain situational response procedures.
Learners can analyze safety rule violation cases and propose improvement measures through team-based scenario workshops.
Learners can create a field risk assessment checklist using personal devices and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
